app.name: Instaq
selection_headline: Which one is your best photo?
selection_popup_title: Let Instaq find instagram's most relevant hashtags for this wonderful photo
leave_feedback_comments: How can we make it better?
loading_desc1: Did you know that each hashtag can boost your Insta post upto 10+ likes avarage?
feedback_intro: We wish you had a great experience. To build an ever better experience, we want to include you in the process of making it. If you like Instaq, you can present your support by sharing your insights with us, ask for a feature or write us an e-mail to instaq@innocliq.me.
about_desc:
Thank you for using Instaq.

We believe in improving the process of choosing Instagram hashtags. To bring the same quality of hashtags used by influencer agengies to everyone, we want to build Instaq empowering with powerful algorithms to analyze Instagram's latest, most successful content and build a  great User Experience around it.

Do you agree with our vision? Let us build this dream together. Contribute to Instaq by giving feedback for hashtags or ask for features or improvements.
about_credits_1: Dario D. Müller from Germany for Management and Development
about_credits_2: Tim Wiesenmüller from Germany for Management
about_credits_3: Jabub Jiricka from Czech Republic for Frontend UI Development
about_credits_4: Nazar Nastin from Ukraine for UI/UX Design
about_credits_5: Aditia Kurniawan from Indonesia for Logo
about_credits_6: Christan und Paul from Germany for kickstarting this Idea
about_opensource_intro: Thanks for the following software to be open source :)
store_intro: Buy photos to get uncensored hashtag results. All packages include an lifelong unlimited history.
store_outro: Keep in mind that Google takes 30 % off every transaction.
faq_outro: Any improvement ideas? Want to give other people some good advices? Let us know.
settings_share_subline: Tell your best friends about Instaq
share:
Hey, I found this app called Instaq. It helped me finding the most relevant instagram hashtags for my photos. Let it help you, too. It's free :)

http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.innocliq.instaq
